I would like to thank notable contributors to Viridithas (listed in alphabetical order):

Archishou, for optimisations to quiescence search and his work on enhanced aspiration windows.
Chef, for improving tooling and devising the pinned SEE algorithm.
Ciekce, for his work on time management, board representation, and threat history.
Johan, for his fantastic work keeping SweHosting running, and for generously advancing chess programming with his donations of hardware-time.
Lily, for her comments and observations on null search.
Sp00ph, for making viri Stacked Borrows-compliant, and for writing assembly for NEON.
Typo, for rich conversation on lazy symmetric multi-processing.
